title: Add grep-ast and tree-sitter dependencies
description:
Add required dependencies for AST-based code search to pyproject.toml.

## Objective
Install and configure grep-ast and tree-sitter libraries needed for code structure analysis.

## Tasks
1. Add to pyproject.toml [tool.poetry.dependencies]:
   - grep-ast = "^0.3.0"
   - tree-sitter = "^0.20.0"

2. Test installation:
   - Run poetry install
   - Verify imports work
   - Test basic tree-sitter parsing

3. Add to extras if needed:
   - Consider making optional dependency
   - Add to 'search' or 'code-analysis' extra

4. Update documentation:
   - Add to installation.md
   - Note in README.md features section

## Acceptance Criteria
- Dependencies install cleanly
- No version conflicts
- Imports successful
- CI/CD passes with new deps

## Notes
- grep-ast is used by Aider (3.4M installs)
- tree-sitter is widely used, mature library
- Both are MIT licensed

## Estimated Effort
1-2 hours

## References
- Aider pyproject.toml for version guidance
- grep-ast: https://github.com/paul-gauthier/grep-ast
